title: Time for the Clan
description: The exciting conclusion of the Dunskey Castle series! Ashley worries the faeries are about to kill her. She has to escape and warn Connell, or his Highland clan could be separated by time forever. Can they make the druid curse help them?There are 14 other books in the series! author: Jane Stain
